table.title: USB 3.2 Gen 2x1, Gen 1x1 Type-A External With Redriver Topology Notes

entry.p: Note1*: Max/ min routing length for USB 3.2 Gen 1 & 2 speeds (5/ 10 Gbps) depends on redriver performance and its loss compensation capability when used in conjunction with Intel CPU. Work with repeater vendor to ensure the selected part can provide adequate signal integrity at the CPU.
Work with the vendor to ensure that the maximum via count is met
Work with the vendor to ensure that the maximum via count is met
